amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the documents known as "Morton memos".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the "Morton Memos".

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A040) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 201 (Roll no. 208).
